comment: I did the Gerudo desert Seven Heroins puzzle off stream yesterday and I think shrine quests are my favorite part of Breath of the Wild , especially ones involving puzzles in the environment that aren't introduced to you . You just gotta figure out that there's a puzzle to solve
amr:
# ::snt I did the Gerudo desert Seven Heroins puzzle off stream yesterday and I think shrine quests are my favorite part of Breath of the Wild , especially ones involving puzzles in the environment that aren't introduced to you . You just gotta figure out that there's a puzzle to solve
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / do-02
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (p / puzzle
                        :mod (d2 / desert
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Gerudo"))
                        :mod (h / hero
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Seven"
                                    :op2 "Heroins")))
                  :manner (o / off-line)
                  :time (y / yesterday))
            :op2 (t / think-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (f / favor-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (q / quest-01
                              :mod (s / shrine)
                              :part-of (w / work-of-art
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Breath"
                                          :op2 "of"
                                          :op3 "the"
                                          :op4 "Wild"))
                              :ARG2-of (ii2 / include-91
                                    :ARG1 (q2 / quest-01
                                          :mod s
                                          :ARG2-of (ii3 / involve-01
                                                :ARG1 (p2 / puzzle
                                                      :location (e / environment
                                                            :ARG1-of (ii4 / introduce-01
                                                                  :polarity -
                                                                  :ARG2 ii))))
                                          :mod (e2 / especially)))))))
      :snt2 (g / get-04
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (f2 / figure-out-05
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (p3 / puzzle
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / solve-01
                              :ARG0 y2)))
            :mod (j / just)))

comment: Seven Heroines * Seven heroins is what you try when being an eenophile gets stale . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Seven Heroines * Seven heroins is what you try when being an eenophile gets stale . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hero
            :quant 7)
      :snt2 (t / try-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 h
            :time (g / get-03
                  :ARG1 (e / eenophile
                        :domain y)
                  :ARG2 (s / stale))))
